text: waldhyn sabaquu alnaas awla 'iilaa al'iiman biallah warasulih min almuhajirin aladhin hujiruu qawmahum weshyrthm wantqlu 'iilaa dar al'islam, wal'ansar aladhin nsru rasul allah salaa allah ealayh wasalam ealaa aedayh alkfar, waladhin atabaeuhum bi'iihsan fi alaietiqad walaqwal wal'aemal tlbana lmrdat allah subhanah wtealaØŒ 'uwlayik aldhyn radi allah eanhum ltaethm allah wrswlh, waraduu eanh lamaa ajzl lahum min althawab ealaa taethm w'iymanhm, waedd lahum janaat tajri tahtaha al'anhar khalidin fiha abdana, dhlk hu alfalah alezym. wafi hadhih alayat tzkyt llshabt -rdy allah enhm- wataedil lhm, wthna' elyhm; wlhdha fa'iina twqyrhm min aswl al'iyman
